extendedInfo.description: Reach the heart of the castle with as few clicks as possible!âGuide the character in 7 unique ways through a lovely designed castle composed of 17 retro style levels - only by clicking on the screen.âShare your highscore with your friends via facebook and compete against them for the top spot.Can you reach the platinum award before your friends do?âHow to play:One Button Steve is easy to understand, but difficult to master.Press anywhere on the screen to move the character.There's only one move per level, but lots of ways to finish it. It's your mission to find the one that takes the least clicks.Follow us on Facebook:facebook.com/CurrynurtTags: one, button, game, steve, single, 1, click, function, jump, run, jump'n'run, highscore, currynurt, bob, trescher, one button bob, 8 bit, 2d, one button game, 1 button game, single button game, one button steve, trescha ,puzzle, child, children, retro, bird, birds, chains, chain, jump, gravity, rope

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: This game is very cool. A concept of which I have not seen before and it works very well. Worth checking out!  And to those who have Giftiz, enter my G-Code for 2 free spins on the roulette wheel :-D IYJFY3
reviews.author: Nathan Wickett

reviews.title: I really liked it
reviews.comment: It was a fun game more levels would give it five stars
reviews.author: Gersom Teran

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very similar to browser game \"one button bob\", this game is so much fun!!
reviews.author: Scott Duckworth

reviews.title: Good try
reviews.comment: Frustrating and a steep learning curve.  A sliw ramp up in didficulty and a little posituve reinforcement would make this a much more palatable diversion.
reviews.author: Mike Rowe
